message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price, considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,050,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,100,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that number. I'm willing to pay $1,075,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering its value to me.
